verbose_text: Furthermore, we observed a clear correlation between CAV1 expression and YAP nuclear localization in human cancer associated fibroblasts (CAFs) from pancreatic tumors (XREF_FIG C and 5D), and CAV1 silencing in these cells induced YAP cytosolic retention (XREF_FIG D), supporting a major role for a CAV1-YAP regulation in determining the activation state of stromal cell populations in vivo.
evidence: CAV1 silencing in these cells induced YAP cytosolic retention
